title: Rain
explanationEnUs: Use 'will' for predictions or instant decisions.

title: Those
content: Look at those clouds! It [is going to|will] rain.
explanationEnUs: Use 'going to' for predictions based on evidence.
explanationZhTw: 根據證據做出的預測使用 'going to'。
explanationZhCn: 根据证据做出的预测使用 'going to'。

title: Paris
content: This time next week, I [will be flying|will fly] to Paris.
explanationEnUs: Future action in progress at a specific time.
explanationZhTw: 未來特定時間正在進行的動作。
explanationZhCn: 未来特定时间正在进行的动作。

title: Close
content: I'm cold. I [will close|am closing] the window.
explanationEnUs: Use 'will' for instant decisions made at the moment of speaking.
explanationZhTw: 說話當下做出的決定使用 'will'。
explanationZhCn: 说话当下做出的决定使用 'will'。

title: Help
content: Don't worry, I [will help|am helping] you with your homework.

title: Mars
content: I believe people [will live|are living] on Mars someday.
explanationEnUs: Use 'will' for predictions based on opinion or belief.
explanationZhTw: 根據觀點或是信念做出的預測使用 'will'。
explanationZhCn: 根据观点或是信念做出的预测使用 'will'。

title: Call
content: I [will call|call] you when I arrive.
explanationEnUs: Use 'will' to state a future fact or promise.
explanationZhTw: 陳述未來事實或承諾使用 'will'。
explanationZhCn: 陈述未来事实或承诺使用 'will'。

title: Visit
content: We [are going to visit|visit] our grandparents this weekend.
explanationEnUs: Use 'going to' for planned actions or intentions.
explanationZhTw: 計畫好的行動或意圖使用 'going to'。
explanationZhCn: 计划好的行动或意图使用 'going to'。

title: Fall
content: Watch out! You [are going to fall|will fall]!
explanationEnUs: Use 'going to' for predictions when there is present evidence.
explanationZhTw: 當有現有證據時的預測使用 'going to'。
explanationZhCn: 当有现有证据时的预测使用 'going to'。

title: Buy
content: I [am going to buy|will buy] a new car next year.

title: Pregnant
content: She is pregnant. She [is going to have|will have] a baby.
explanationEnUs: Use 'going to' when there is physical evidence.
explanationZhTw: 有實質證據時使用 'going to'。
explanationZhCn: 有实质证据时使用 'going to'。

title: Watch
content: Don't call me at 8. I [will be watching|will watch] the game.
explanationEnUs: Use Future Continuous for an action that will be happening at a specific time.
explanationZhTw: 用於在特定時間正在發生的動作。
explanationZhCn: 用于在特定时间正在发生的动作。

title: Work
content: At 10 AM tomorrow, I [will be working|work] in my office.
explanationEnUs: Action in progress at a future time.
explanationZhTw: 未來某個時間正在進行的動作。
explanationZhCn: 未来某个时间正在进行的动作。

title: Hav
content: When you arrive, we [will be having|will have] dinner.
explanationEnUs: Action already in progress when something else happens.
explanationZhTw: 當另一件事發生時，該動作已在進行中。
explanationZhCn: 当另一件事发生时，该动作已在进行中。

title: Meeting
content: I [will be seeing|will see] him at the meeting tomorrow.
explanationEnUs: Use Future Continuous for something that will happen as part of a routine.
explanationZhTw: 用於常規或安排好的未來事件。
explanationZhCn: 用于常规或安排好的未来事件。
